subject: Elevators and Escalators
Skiing
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The skier Cody Marshall returned home from the hospital less than two months after sustaining severe head trauma in a 20-foot fall after sliding down an escalator railing.
snippet: The skier Cody Marshall returned home from the hospital less than two months after sustaining severe head trauma in a 20-foot fall after sliding down an escalator railing.
